Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

To the best of my kerbal level intelligence, I don't know where to post a repeatable crash report on the site (unmodded). Any help is appreciated. Thank you.

Here would not be a bad place De4tht1de, I moved your thread, welcome to the Support section

We'll try to help you avoid the crash, but if you want to report a bug please see the stickies in this section, there's a link to the bug tracker at the bottom of the "read this before posting!" thread.

Edited June 4, 2015 by sal_vager

This is a crash that happens while just testing things out. I think it is a rather minor issue and you would have to go out of your way to repeat it, but I wanted to report it regardless since it happened 2 times in a row. I will look into the stickies as suggested.

mine happened with something major. Everytime i started my KSP, it crashes instantly. the error was :

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.6.4f1_99f88340878d]

KSP.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

in module KSP.exe at 001b:00000000.

Error occurred at 2015-06-05_105002.

C:\Users\Admin\Desktop\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by Admin.

32% memory in use.

2047 MB physical memory [1373 MB free].

4093 MB paging file [3326 MB free].

2048 MB user address space [1901 MB free].

Write to location 00000000 caused an access violation.

Help? anyone know what happened?

- - - Updated - - -

oh yeah, i was runnung a copy of my own KSP so its on the desktop which is unmodded as the original one was heavily moddded

C:\Users\Admin\Desktop\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe

This is bad, and can prevent the game from working correctly or at all.
